dialogue: This budget would only work if the project encountered no problems whatsoever.
Therefore, this budget is almost certainly wrong.
Leaders do not plan for failure.
Do leaders make deceptive forecasts and later act shocked when things don't work out?
A leader first makes himself believe the lie, thus turning deception into an inspiring form of optimism.
The swelling will go down in a few hours.
Then we'll have a perfect budget.
